name: 2 Day Inca Trail Private Service
description: The 2 day Inca Trail is a fantastic option to see the highlights of the Inca Trail in a shorter amount of time. This trek features beautiful scenery, a wide variety of flora and fauna, and a visit to the Inca Trail's most beautiful site, Wiñay Wayna. Covering a distance of just 10km / 6.3 miles, the 2 day Inca Trail is not too challenging which makes it perfect for families with children and  travellers on a tight time schedule.
